Title: Shopware Broken ACL on Document retrieval to access other customers documents
Description: It's possible to guess the deepLinkCode of an Document to open documents of other customers
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.6.0.0 before 6.6.10.3, all versions starting from 6.7.0.0-rc1 before 6.7.0.0-rc2, all versions before 6.5.8.17
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.6.0.0, all versions starting from 6.6.10.3 before 6.7.0.0-rc1, all versions starting from 6.7.0.0-rc2 before 0, all versions starting from 6.5.8.17
